current_state_review.functionality: Stable RLNC with Pseudo-SIMD and multi-threaded simulation.
current_state_review.limitation: I/O is still buffer-based; networking is simulated.

core_intent: To transition from a structural proof-of-concept to a high-performance, real-world network utility.

strategic_roadmap.title: Congestion & Loss Simulation
strategic_roadmap.objective: Simulate real-world degradation (jitter, latency spikes, and burst loss).

strategic_roadmap.title: Hardware-Aware Concurrency
strategic_roadmap.objective: Dynamic worker scaling based on logical CPU core detection.

strategic_roadmap.title: SIMD / WASM Optimization
strategic_roadmap.objective: Migrate GF(256) math to WASM (Pseudo-SIMD implemented).

strategic_roadmap.title: Streaming API Integration
strategic_roadmap.objective: Transition from fixed-block processing to continuous data stream buffer.

strategic_roadmap.title: Advanced Testing & Verification
strategic_roadmap.objective: Implement property-based fuzzing and stress tests.

milestones.phase_1: Verified: Stress-test v7 baseline math and threading.
